Text: Final Project Ice Compensation Spreadsheetfind the latest compensation spreadsheet We will have a conference call on Saturday at am to discuss compensation issues The dialin number is The participant code is Raul

Project Ice Credit Risk Summaryis the credit summary put together by Tom Moran from our credit group Sovereign Risk China MM in open credit risk at any given time with different counterparts MM in inventory ENE must be willing to commit to MM in China on an unsecured basis at Transammonias current business level Prepayments for supply in Ukraine and Russia Magnitudes of these prepays is not yet clear Currently a reserve is being held from the prepayment date until delivery date Product is currently sourced and sold in countries with low ERatings and where Enron does not have much credit knowledge Credit Risk M note thousand not million in reported credit losses since MM as allowance for doubtful accounts on the balance sheet All prepayments and LC transactions are coordinated with credit in NY office Credit rating system of AB or C MM in outgoing LC are currently issued by Transammonia Unable to determine counterparty concentration risk due to incomplete AR AP reporting should be obtained at followup due diligence Most petchem and LPG counterparties are well know to Enron credit Almost all fertilizer counterparties are new to Enron Raul

Project Ice DCF Assumptionsare the primary DCF assumptions WACC EBIT from existing business was calculated as an average of and with certain adjustments Growth rate is per annum Financial trading earnings estimates as per John Nowlan are as follows urea and ammonia only Yr MM Yr MM Yr MM Yr MM Yr and future MM per year Origination earnings estimates as per John Nowlan are as follows all products Yr MM Yr MM Yr MM Yr MM Yr MM Future MM incremental earnings every year Working capital requirements continue to grow at the same pace ie no efficiency in working capital assumed MM of capex every three years for capital improvements in addition to annual maintenance items that are expensed on the Income Statement Raul
Project Ice Presentation is the presentation I distributed during this mornings meeting It is best viewed in color Raul

RE Tennis AnyoneGuys Thurs nights are softball nights for me I can play on Friday or next week Thanks Raul Original Message From Hilgert Chris Sent Tuesday October AM To Rogers Benjamin Eubank Marshall Rizopatron Raul Subject Tennis Anyone Gents Interested in some doubles this Thursday after work Let me know at your earliest convenience and Ill finalize a court time over at the Met ish Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression
